summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to their team regarding draft motions in limine (MIL) concerning pseudonyms and sympathy. The email references an upcoming trip to California by someone named M.

events.title: M's flight to California
events.description: M is scheduled to fly to California; the email wishes them a safe flight and good luck.

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is an internal email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the SDNY, dated October 12, 2021.
The email discusses draft motions in limine (MIL) related to the use of pseudonyms and a 'sympathy' motion in an ongoing case.
The sender references a colleague, 'M', who is traveling to California the following day.
